item.title: How to Use Hugo
item.description: [TOC] 1. Quick Start 1.1 Install Hugo Hugo Install on Ubuntu 1.2 Create a New Site hugo new site quickstart The above will create a new Hugo site in a folder named quickstart 1.3 Add a Theme First, download the theme from GitHub and add it to your site’s themes directory cd quickstart git init git submodule add https://github.com/budparr/gohugo-theme-ananke.git themes/ananke Then, add the theme to the site configuration:
